X.ii.6.G.1.h
.
Hearing Requests
If a hearing is requested after the VSC prepares a rating proposing incompetency, the VSC transfers the claims folder (or jurisdiction over the eFolder) to the RO having jurisdiction based on the personâ€™s place of residence.
The RO responsible for conducting the hearing
holds the hearing
prepares the final rating decision regarding competency, and
notifies the IC.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section G - Competency Determinations for the Insurance Center (IC)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 6, Section G
